programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa

programme.desc: A 19 year old ignores his family's pleas to go to college to start his real estate investment career. An investor agreed to let him take lead on a flip, and Tarek must coach him to be fearless when facing an $80,000 renovation.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Tarek and Christina spot a new listing in Buena Park, California that's small and run down but sits on a very large lot, offering possibilities for added value and increased profit.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Tarek and Christina get a lead from their friend and investor, Pete, on a house he's recently purchased. It's situated in an upscale, gated neighbourhood and it's a house Pete can't tackle on his own.

programme.title: Flip or Flop

programme.title: Christmas in Homestead

programme.title: On the Twelfth Day of Christmas
programme.desc: Maggie is thrilled when her long time crush, Mitch, moves to her little town. Once she discovers his love for Christmas has changed she vows to bring his holiday spirit back.

programme.title: Home and Family
programme.desc: Guests include Holly Robinson Peete, Brendan Penny and Ashley Greene.

programme.title: Pride, Prejudice and Mistletoe
programme.desc: A career-driven woman finds her life turned upside down when she is forced to return to her hometown to care for her sick mother.

programme.title: Once Upon a Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: A woman falls in love with her liver donor, and his selfless gesture leads to a Christmas miracle for everyone.

programme.title: Christmas Under Wraps
programme.desc: A woman loses her job and beau on the same day and reluctantly accepts a position in Alaska. When she gets the position she originally hoped for, she must choose between a life she's always wanted and her new life in Alaska.

programme.title: Christmas by Starlight
programme.desc: When her family's beloved eatery, The Starlight Café, is slated for demolition, Annie vows to put a stop to it before Christmas.

programme.title: The Christmas House
programme.desc: When a TV star's parents ask him to bring back a revered family tradition, he revisits the family's traditions and brings back the magic of Christmases past.

programme.title: Five Star Christmas
programme.desc: When a travel writer shows up unexpectedly at their dad's B&B, the Ralston family all pretend to be guests in hopes of a good review.

programme.title: Christmas Getaway
programme.desc: A recently single travel writer is forced to share a cabin due to a mix up on her holiday vacation. What is an annoyance at first quickly changes to a new romance.

programme.title: Christmas Made to Order
programme.desc: A Christmas amateur finds himself in charge of his family's holiday celebration. Desperate for help, he enlists an expert in all things Christmas and together, they discover what's truly important in life.

programme.title: A Crown for Christmas
programme.desc: After getting fired from her job at a ritzy NYC hotel, a woman accepts a job as a governess to a young girl. She finds herself attracted to the girl’s father, who is king of the country, and love reigns over the kingdom.

programme.title: A Very Merry Mix-Up
programme.desc: A woman is headed to spend the holidays with her fiancé's family, but a mix up at the airport lands her at the wrong home. She quickly forms a bond with the 'wrong' family, especially the handsome son.

programme.title: Check Inn to Christmas
programme.desc: A town's Christmas celebration is used to reunite two families to save an inn.

programme.title: Home and Family
programme.desc: Guests include Lacey Chabert, Rukiya Bernard and Antonio Cayonne.

programme.title: Marry Me at Christmas
programme.desc: A bridal boutique owner finds out she'll be working closely with her crush.

programme.title: Christmas at Cartwright's
programme.desc: A single mom is unemployed and broke at Christmas. She is desperate to find a job in order to make her daughter's holiday a happy one.

programme.title: The Christmas Cottage
programme.desc: An interior designer is made-of-honour at her friend’s wedding. Before the big day, she ends up stranded in the Christmas Cottage, where rumour has it, all guests will find everlasting love, with the brother of the bride.

programme.title: Holiday Date
programme.desc: A man poses as a former boyfriend for a woman when she returns home for the holidays. As her family celebrates Christmas, he requests they also celebrate Hanukah and a merry ruse is born.

programme.title: If I Only Had Christmas
programme.desc: At Christmas, a cheerful publicist teams up with a cynical VP and his eclectic team to help a charity in need.

programme.title: Christmas Waltz
programme.desc: After a woman's storybook Christmas wedding is canceled, a dance instructor helps her face her fears in life and fulfill her dream of learning to dance.

programme.title: Christmas in Vienna
programme.desc: A concert violinist who has lost her passion visits Vienna for Christmas. There she finds the inspiration she has been missing with an American diplomat and his children.

programme.title: Christmas Town
programme.desc: A woman leaves behind a life in Boston to embark on a new adventure. Unbeknownst to her, she ends up on an unexpected detour that changes both her life, and her romantic future.

programme.title: A Cookie Cutter Christmas
programme.desc: Two long-time rival school teachers duke it out during the holidays in a bake-off. With both determined to win the prize, their competitiveness could jeopardize what matters most this Christmas season.

programme.title: A Royal Christmas
programme.desc: A woman is whisked away to Europe when her boyfriend reveals he's actually a prince.

programme.title: The Mistletoe Promise
programme.desc: Two strangers who share a disdain for Christmas navigate their holiday complications together by creating The Mistletoe Promise. As they spend more time with each other, they discover there may be more to their contract.

programme.title: Home and Family
programme.desc: Gwen Stefani shares her new song and music video, plus Danica McKellar.

programme.title: Never Kiss a Man in a Christmas Sweater
programme.desc: Single mom Maggie is facing Christmas alone until Lucas crashes into her life and becomes an unexpected houseguest. Together they overcome Christmas while finding comfort in their growing bond.

programme.title: Christmas Wishes and Mistletoe Kisses
programme.desc: A woman is hired to decorate an estate building a few weeks before Christmas. While there, she works to break down the wall between her and the business owner, all while keeping the holiday spirit alive.

programme.title: Christmas at Pemberley Manor
programme.desc: A rookie party planner works with a serious and all-business to put together a Christmas festival with help from a merrily enigmatic caretaker who looks like Santa. As the festival approaches, the spirit of the holidays may lead to a wish of love.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen: Letters to Santa
programme.desc: A woman returns to her home town for Christmas and discovers that the town's historic general store has shut down. Using the skills she has as a retail designer, she is determined to bring the store back to life in time for the holidays.

programme.title: A Nashville Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A television producer is forced to work with the man who broke her heart on a country music Christmas special while being interrupted by Christmas spirits determined for her to revisit her past.

programme.title: A Christmas Tree Grows in Colorado
programme.desc: A woman is planning the town's Christmas celebration and must win over a firefighter in order to obtain his beautiful spruce for the tree lighting.

programme.title: The Mistletoe Secret
programme.desc: A woman has big hopes for her town's big holiday adventure, until she meets the man behind the plan.

programme.title: A Dream of Christmas
programme.desc: A restless young married woman is granted a wish by a Christmas Angel to be single again. She soon realizes that her new life isn't what she bargained for and embarks on a quest to win her husband back.

programme.title: Christmas in Montana
programme.desc: A woman heads off to Montana before the holidays to help a man save his ranch.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Stars
programme.desc: A man loses his job right before Christmas, so he takes a temporary job selling trees. While at work, he meets a woman and her son, who are dealing with the sudden loss of her father. The two get to talking, and out of their loss, love grows.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas
programme.desc: Two people find their paths continuing to cross over the holidays at Martha's Vineyard.

programme.title: Finding Christmas
programme.desc: A disgruntled New York ad executive swaps houses over Christmas with a disheartened North Carolina repairman, who is going through his own heartache.

programme.title: The Christmas Ornament
programme.desc: A widow has a hard time facing her first Christmas without her husband when she meets a Christmas tree lot owner who helps her to see that there is still hope and love in the world.

programme.title: Christmas on Honeysuckle Lane
programme.desc: A sister is in charge of selling their recently deceased parents' home, where she and an antiques expert find a hidden surprise that sends them on a journey to discover the power of love and family in the holidays.

programme.title: Operation Christmas
programme.desc: A single mother does not let her Christmas be ruined by her boyfriend being deployed.

programme.title: Sound of Christmas
programme.desc: During the Christmas season a high school music teacher is hired by a handsome widower to give music lessons to his teenage daughters. Their lives are turned around for the better as the family grows closer and learns the importance of love.

programme.title: Nostalgic Christmas
programme.desc: A woman helps her family close their toy-store, but what she finds, inspires an entire town that is in need of some Christmas cheer.

programme.title: Memories of Christmas
programme.desc: When Noelle inherits her late mother's home, she discovers Dave had been hired by her mother to decorate for the holidays each year. Dave convinces Noelle to continue the tradition as she begins to embrace her mother's holiday legacy.

programme.title: A Blue Ridge Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: A hotel manager returns home to help her sister plan her wedding. She must work together with the current owner of the inn her family used to own to plan the perfect day for her sister.

programme.title: Christmas at Grand Valley
programme.desc: An artist returns home to Grand Valley just in time for Christmas. While there, she meets a single-dad and they soon find their worlds colliding.

programme.title: Home for Christmas Day
programme.desc: A mother tries to protect her daughter from heartache after she develops a long-distance relationship with a soldier. They'll all soon learn lessons from the heart during a Christmas they'll cherish forever.

programme.title: A Christmas Love Story
programme.desc: A youth-choir director is tasked with writing the title song for her Christmas Eve show but becomes distracted when a gifted boy joins the choir. Unbeknownst to her, this boy does not tell his widowed father of his plans to sing in the service.

programme.title: The Christmas Ring
programme.desc: A reporter searches for the love story behind an antique engagement ring. With the help of the ring's owner's grandson, they learn the legacy his grandparent's left behind.

programme.title: The Angel Tree
programme.desc: A writer seeks the identity of the person who helps grant wishes that are placed upon an Angel tree. In the process, she finds herself reconnecting with her childhood friends.

programme.title: A Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: A woman has her cover-story stolen, so, she searches for a new story to write about, a Christmas miracle. With the help of her son, and a handsome photographer, she finds the true miracle of the holidays, love.

programme.title: Time for You to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: A woman returns home after the death of her husband where she meets a veteran. As Christmas nears, they form a bond that may be the miracle they were both looking for.

programme.title: Holiday Engagement
programme.desc: A woman hires a man to pretend to be her fiancé over the holidays, but she soon realizes that she is in over her head and has to face the music.

programme.title: Northern Lights of Christmas
programme.desc: A woman's goals are thrown off course when she inherits a reindeer farm and a dangerously handsome ranch hand, Alec. When Alec opens up, the two start falling for each other.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Meant for Love
programme.desc: After many unbelievable coincidences, including being in the wrong place at the right time, two strangers discover they and their families were meant to be intertwined.

programme.title: A Christmas for the Books
programme.desc: A lifestyle guru is forced to prove she is a romance expert during an interview for her dream job.

programme.title: Hearts of Christmas
programme.desc: When a supervisor is forced to take early retirement, her young colleague, Jenny, decides to turn the upcoming staff Christmas party into a surprise celebration.

programme.title: Christmas Bells are Ringing
programme.desc: A woman returns to Cape Cod for the first time after her mother's death and falls in love.

programme.title: Christmas Tree Lane
programme.desc: A woman spearheads her community efforts to save her street from demolition. While on her mission, she falls for a man and uncovers that he is actually working for the company she is fighting.

programme.title: A Gift to Remember
programme.desc: An accident between a sweet bookshop worker and a handsome stranger leaves him without his memory.

programme.title: USS Christmas
programme.desc: A reporter heads off on a cruise during the holidays where she falls for a naval officer. Together, the two of them must try to solve a mystery found upon the ship.

programme.title: Christmas Homecoming
programme.desc: A military widow and an Army Captain team up to save the town's military museum.

programme.title: The Magical Christmas Ornaments
programme.desc: Marie finds her Christmas spirit reawakened when her mother begins sending her the family's Christmas ornaments.

programme.title: Christmas on My Mind
programme.desc: A woman wakes up from a dream, holding a wedding dress, and assuming she is about to marry her fiancée. Only, that dream, ended two years before, and she has no idea who her current fiancée is.

programme.title: A Princess for Christmas
programme.desc: A young woman takes her niece and nephew to the English countryside to visit their grandfather, a royal duke, for Christmas. While there, she unwittingly falls for a dashing prince.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Stars
programme.desc: A man loses his job right before Christmas, so he takes a temporary job selling trees. While at work, he meets a woman and her son, who are dealing with the sudden loss of her father. The two get to talking, and out of their loss, love grows.

programme.title: Holiday for Heroes
programme.desc: Worlds suddenly collide for a woman and a soldier who have been exchanging letters for a year finally meet.

programme.title: Catch a Christmas Star
programme.desc: When a pop star reunites with her first love, the pressures of the spotlight could threaten their budding romance.

programme.title: A Family Christmas Gift
programme.desc: A woman spends the holidays with her aunt to help plan a Christmas concert. While there, she finds herself drawing closer to her aunt, and, to the new love in her life.

programme.title: Last Vermont Christmas
programme.desc: The Marvin sisters always spend Christmas in their family home. This is coming to an end as their parents have decided to sell the house to sister Megan's high-school boyfriend. Spending time together, Megan realizes she may be falling in love.

programme.title: Meet Me at Christmas
programme.desc: A woman is forced to take the reins when her son's wedding planner quits on Christmas Eve. She receives some unexpected help from the bride's uncle, and realizes that fate has sent her a man from her past.

programme.title: Time for Me to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: A cancelled flight lands two unlikely strangers together.

programme.title: A Bramble House Christmas
programme.desc: A man goes undercover to discover the truth about his father's final days.

programme.title: Christmas in Angel Falls
programme.desc: Guardian Angel Gaby is sent to the town of Angel Falls to help restore it's Christmas Spirit. There she meets a volunteer fire chief that shows her the true meaning of love.

programme.title: The Way Back
programme.desc: A former high school basketball prodigy accepts a coaching job for a chance at redemption.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: Judith Therianos is a free-spirit; someone who very much wants to see the good in everyone. But Florida detectives unearth video surveillance that shows her utterly alone and blissfully unaware of the danger just moments before her life is cut short.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: Donald Lewis is a popular musician who owns a local Jazz Cafe. Despite being beloved in the community, mystery strikes when he suddenly disappears from his jazz club along with his employee. Detectives must find the both of them before it's too late.

programme.title: The Menendez Brothers: The Crimes That Changed Us
programme.desc: When a Hollywood executive and his wife are brutally killed in a wealthy neighbourhood, suspicion falls on their two sons. Charged with the murders, the brothers reveal disturbing family secrets, and the scene is set for one of the most shocking trials.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: The parents of a young South Carolina couple are terrified when they go missing in 2016. Detectives find a clue that leads to strange storage container in the middle of 95 acres. What's inside unlocks secrets of a monster hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: Texas A&M University professor Dr. Jim Aune appears to have it all, but unknown to his family or students, his life is in freefall as dark online secrets threaten to spill out into real life.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: City-girl Leslie Belkin moves south and meets a man on Craigslist. At first George seems perfect - he's nice and helpful around the yard. But once she discovers his criminal record, she realizes she isn't the only casual encounter George has made online.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A mother’s intuition leads campus cops in Western New York to a terrible discovery in a dorm room.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: An ex-Navy man marries the love of his life. Five months later his new bride finds him dead on their bedroom floor. With no apparent cause of death, family and authorities are left puzzled.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When a successful luxury car dealer is murdered in his sleep, detectives soon focus in on one of the victim’s many lovers. But with little hard evidence to go on, the investigation stalls – until a year later.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Two can keep a secret, if one of them is dead. These Deadly Women think they've committed the perfect murders.

programme.title: Deadly Women

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: In the game of love the stakes are high not everyone can be a winner.

programme.title: Deadly Women

programme.title: The Case That Haunts Me
programme.desc: When a terrified sex worker asks Detective Penny Hart for help, she knows it must be serious. Things quickly intensify when the same frightened informant goes missing and is feared to be dead.

programme.title: The Case That Haunts Me
programme.desc: Lethbridge Police Detective Ryan Stef pushes his investigative creativity to the limit as he tries to solve the vicious murder of an innocent grandmother.

programme.title: The Case That Haunts Me
programme.desc: When 72 year-old Bruce Firman is found brutally murdered in his home, Detective Keri Harrison must discover who would want this kind, elderly man dead.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: In February 2008, Christopher Duncan left his apartment in San Antonio Texas, never to return again. Police have little to go on until surveillance footage has the potential to reveal the identity of a dangerous killer.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: In February 2015, the body of 26-year-old Celina Petersen is found dumped in an alley in South Park, Seattle. When police recover surveillance footage from across the neighborhood, they begin to unravel the shocking truth behind her murder.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: On April 14, 2009, 25-year old student Julissa Brisman is found shot and bound in an upmarket hotel room in Boston. With no witnesses to the crime, investigators turn to surveillance cameras in the surrounding area and quickly unravel a serial attacker.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: On November 7, 2014, 69-year old Ina Clare Richardson is found brutally murdered in a public park in Clarkston, Washington. With no witnesses to the crime, investigators turn to surveillance cameras to piece together the puzzle of her fateful final night.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Shelly Lietz had been afraid of her son ever since he was four years old. She knew she saw something evil in his eyes that scared her. As he got older and more violent, that fear crippled her, eventually making her a prisoner in her own home.

programme.title: A Time to Kill
programme.desc: A car explosion outside a Tucson country club leaves a business tycoon dead. Detectives determine the killer detonated the homemade bomb at close range, and the list of suspects soon includes mobsters, defrauded investors, and the victim's ex-wife.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here: Shadows of Death
programme.desc: In 1996, in Tulsa, Oklahoma, a young mother is found dead on the side of a rural stretch of highway in an apparent hit-and-run accident. But as the family grieves, the façade begins to crack, and soon the truth seeps out.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: When Robin Doll was rescued from her mother's violence and went to live with her father, she thought she had cheated death. She had no way of knowing that the man she looked to as her savior was hiding something even worse.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here

programme.title: The 1980s: The Deadliest Decade

programme.title: The 1990s: The Deadliest Decade
programme.desc: Lisa Carlson is found murdered in her own home. It seems robbers surprised her during a moment of sexual self-satisfaction and killed her on the spot.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: A disabled fireman appoints himself sheriff of his street, policing his neighbors and clamping down on violations ranging from loud music to off leash dogs. Things boil over at a birthday party where shots are fired and blood runs in the street.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: Instead of a brand new start, a man's move to Canyon Country, California, finds him locked in a bizarre and increasingly acrimonious eight year feud with his neighbor – that is finally resolved with blasts from a shotgun.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: A couple who trades the city for the country soon find themselves in conflict with the gun shop owners across the street. Mutual video cameras record threats, fights and growing hostilities that finally lead to shots fired and blood spilled.

programme.title: Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: In 1993, an elementary school teacher goes missing after her first day at a new job. Over the next two months, investigators sift through clues, piecing together the heartbreaking truth behind the young educator's sudden disappearance.

programme.title: Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Between1993 and 1996, the rape and murder of three Arkansas women put local detectives on the trail of a sadistic killer.

programme.title: Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: In 1985, a young military wife and two of her three little girls were viciously murdered in their home.

programme.title: Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: After an all-night study session in a university lab, math student Deborah Wilson is found strangled, missing her shoes and socks. Years later, Philadelphia investigators unearth the shocking obsession that drove a killer to take her life.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers
programme.desc: When a single mother of three misses a routine bank run with her sister, panic begins to spread among the family. The family's nightmare becomes a reality when a passerby finds the beloved petite woman brutally assaulted, nude, and frozen in an alley.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers
programme.desc: Gunshots rip through the icy Idaho air, leaving a young woman gunned down in her doorway. Left behind: shell casings and a trail of footprints in the snow. Police must piece together the clues to catch the shooter in this coldest of crimes.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers
programme.desc: On a wintery December evening, a 29 year old supermom doesn't return home after her meeting. Is she going to miss her daughter's first Christmas? Her family is devastated when the devoted mother is found frozen solid and dumped in the snow.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Single mom Tracy is starting to turn her life around when she falls for attentive Jody. As his jealousy starts to overtake their relationship, she soon comes to realize she can run, but she can't hide.

programme.desc: 19-year-old Micah Rineis striking out on her own when she falls for fellow college student Thomas Pate. But when their love takes her far away from family and friends, Micah begins to wonder who she can really trust.

programme.title: Murder in the Heartland
programme.desc: Christmas will never be the same for the two local residents of Noble, Oklahoma whose dog drops a human skull onto their front porch. After six years and no leads, the police must navigate the twists and turns of the victim's past to find redemption.

programme.title: Murder in the Heartland
programme.desc: A man is hysterical when he finds his brother's girlfriend and roommate beaten with an iron and stabbed to death on the floor. The brothers appear devastated, but the discovery of her missing phone casts doubt on their alibis.

programme.desc: Victoria's boyfriend moves in on a trial basis to see if he can handle her jarring and flush free lifestyle.
